message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper is about transfer learning in reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper proposes a novel method for policy reuse that improves transfer efficiency and guarantees optimality. The paper also provides theoretical guarantees for the proposed method. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.RO (Robotics), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CV (Computer Vision).
